citations.narrative:
The outdoor area of a sheltered housing facility containing two adult white-throated capuchin monkeys is not completely
enclosed by a perimeter fence. The outdoor area of the enclosure has chain link walls and roof, beyond which there is
perimeter fencing. However, the perimeter fence is not complete- it contains a gap approximately 6-feet long near the east
side of the monkey enclosure where perimeter fencing has not yet been installed. A perimeter fence is essential for
preventing contact between exotic animals and unauthorized people or animals. A perimeter fence also acts as a
secondary containment system in the event an animal escapes from its primary enclosure. Correct by installing a
perimeter fence that is at least 6 feet tall around the outdoor area of the primate enclosure, or by obtaining approval from
the Administrator for alternative measures.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
n

narrative:
3.77(f)  Repeat
   
Sheltered housing facilities. 
The outdoor area of a sheltered housing facility containing two adult white-throated capuchin monkeys is not completely 
enclosed by a perimeter fence. The outdoor area of the enclosure has chain link walls and roof, beyond which there is 
perimeter fencing. However, the perimeter fence is not complete- it contains a gap approximately 6-feet long near the east 
side of the monkey enclosure where perimeter fencing has not yet been installed. A perimeter fence is essential for 
preventing contact between exotic animals and unauthorized people or animals. A perimeter fence also acts as a 
secondary containment system in the event an animal escapes from its primary enclosure. Correct by installing a 
perimeter fence that is at least 6 feet tall around the outdoor area of the primate enclosure, or by obtaining approval from 
the Administrator for alternative measures. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner. 
 
 n
